name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Homer Simpson: Comedy and Fun in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy Homer Simpson’s hilarious antics in a lively theme with fun animations and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy the humor and charm of Homer Simpson in this dynamic theme featuring sleek design and quick shortcuts.
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Immerse yourself in the world of Springfield with Homer Simpson’s iconic and entertaining visuals.
Minimalist Design: A clean and playful interface inspired by Homer’s quirky and lovable personality.
Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date at a glance while enjoying Homer’s antics.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly navigate to your favorite websites with ease.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
More Extension: Add fun and humorous features to enhance your browsing experience.
Play Games: Access entertaining games directly from your shortcuts for a fun and engaging experience.
